caption.title: Re-plot of Fig 5 where we adapt our sea-level rise estimates to account for future changes in water stored behind dams and in reservoirs.
caption.p: As in Fig 5, this figure shows a sequential zoom in of the baseline and future 100-yr flood risk areas in San Francisco. However, in this figure we account for changes in land water storage in the year 2100 by adding roughly 0.55 m to the sea-level estimates [ 7].
Click here for additional data file.
